testcase.brief: When HiveAPs are in newly discovered state on HM, what is the capwap state on HiveAPs. If capwap traffic is ok.
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Network is reachable. Configured cli can not connected. Can not get available HM string or HM IP from DHCP. Can not use fixed name “hivemanager” to get ip from DNS. Can not connected to local HM via broadcast. Can not connected to redirector server.
Test Procedure: 1. open _debug capwap ha and debug console to check work flow for CAPWAP choose HM(no capwap client enable, capwap client enable).

step.ssh: -v "capwap client enable" -v "capwap client server name ${test.hm1.ip}" -v "capwap client server backup name ${test.hm2.ip}"

step.desc: Can not get available HM string or HM IP from DHCP
step.ssh: -v "int mgt0 dhcp client address-only " -v "show int mgt0 dhcp client"
step.log-match: -e "DHCP client: Enabled (Only apply IP address and gateway from DHCP-server)" -c

step.desc: Can not use fixed name “hivemanager” to get ip from DNS. Can not connected to local HM via broadcast. Can not connected to redirector server. open debug
step.ssh: -v "_debug capwap ha" -v "clear log buffer" -v "no capwap client enable" -v "capwap client enable"

step.desc: show log buffer to check work flow for capwap choose HM
step.log-match: -e "Can not connect to primary and backup server, try DHCP/DNS/broadcast/redirector" -c
